message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $9,500. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to go down to $8,750?
